headline: Is Merck & Co. (MRK) the Best Depressed Stock to Invest in Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Best Depressed Stocks to Invest in Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) stands against other best depressed stocks to invest in now. The US stocks ended 2024 with a healthy Q4, as the equity markets were primarily […]
